dialogues.speaker: STEAM ON A MIRROR
dialogues.text: 1      ...wiped off by ANDY SACHS, 20's, pretty but not g smart but green, hair up in a towel, brushing her teeth. intercut ANDY getting ready and... ... we see three or four other GIRLS getting ready too. 1A     A drawer filled with about forty lipsticks slides frame... One of the GIRLS carefully applies shiny lip glo with a brush... ANDY puts on cherry Chapstick... 1B&C   A lacy thong floats through the air... one of it up her glossy legs... A comfy cotton pair of Jockey bikinis is tugged out of a pile... ANDY pulls them on... 1D     A gorgeous pair of slingback heels. One of the GIR the shoes on while her model handsome boyfriend reclines crisp white sheets, watching her. 1E     A pair of comfortable wedges... ANDY dresses while rumpled, unshowered, wearing an old Alice in Chains t-shi watches her, reclining in mismatched bed-in-a-bag sheets. 1F&G   A series of quick cuts... ANDY eats a full bre bacon, bagel... One of the GIRLS carefully counts out sev almonds and pours a huge cup of black coffee... 1H&I   ANDY straightens a pile of newspaper clips fro Northwestern with the byline ANDREA SACHS and proudly tuc them into her hideous college-graduation-present briefcas One of the GIRLS takes Listerine breath strips, keys and Gucci moneyclip and shoves everything in a tiny Fendi clu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GIRLS, looking flawless, fold their legs into taxis a town cars as ANDY trots down the street and into the subw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY strides into an office building, confident. A GUARD stops her. Indicates she sign his clipboard. She signs in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What floor is Elias-Clarke? Human Resources.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat. The GUARD just looks at her. What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Honey, you want West 57th.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY runs, but she's moving against the pedestrian tide. widen out to see ANDY, bucking the flow like a salmon goi upstream. She gets to an intersection, starts to cross the street.. ...and just misses being decked by a bike messenger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY sees a tower looming in front of her. Elias-Clarke. Streaming into the building are the polished GIRLS we saw the opening... their heels click-clack on the concrete... They are the CLACKERS of Elias-Clarke. ANDY runs in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY is a shrub in a CLACKER forest. One turns to another

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look awesome today. I can't wear cropped pants. I look like a whale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, please. I look terrible. I almost called in fat today. ANDY looks at them, then down at herself. If they're fat, what am I? Ding! Elevator opens and ANDY exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY sits across from SHERRY, 40's. On the wall are cover from the Elias-Clarke magazines -- a news magazine, a coo magazine, a fitness magazine... and Runway. ANDY is unloading clips from her horrible briefcase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This article was about the Take Back the Night march. This was a four-part series on the impact of busing on the public schools...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SHERRY holds up her finger to stop ANDY talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have two positions available. One is assistant to the road test editor of Auto Universe magazine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (forces a smile) And the other one--?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sleek, elegant, hard-edged chic. Behind the reception des an elegant logo that says RUNWAY. ANDY walks over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, I have an appointment with Emily Charlton--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andrea Sachs?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (EMILY (and MIRANDA, later) pronounce ANDREA Ahn-DRAY-a. refers to herself as AN-dree-a.) ANDY turns and sees a taller, thinner and, amazingly, mor groomed CLACKER. This is EMILY. She looks the part of the sleek fashionista, but is propelled by a core of barely tamped down anxiety. She examines ANDY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Human Resources certainly has a bizarre sense of humor. (sigh, annoyed) Follow me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY briskly walks ANDY down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, so... I was Miranda's second assistant, but her first assistant recently got promoted so now I'm the first...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY glimpses an office in front of them, seductively bri

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you're replacing yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada     2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying. Miranda sacked the last two girls after only a few weeks. We need to find someone who can survive here. Do you understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Of course. Who's Miranda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (eyes widening) You didn't just ask me that. She's the editor in chief of Runway. Not to mention a legend. Work a year for her and you can get a job at any magazine you want. A million girls would kill for this job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds great. I'd love to be considered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles. EMILY tries to think how to break it to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andrea, Runway is a fashion magazine. An interest in fashion is crucial.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What makes you think I'm not interested in fashion?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY gives her a look. ANDY smiles, like she has no idea what EMILY could mean. Suddenly, EMILY'S Blackberry goes off. She gasps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God. No. No, no, no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A black sedan pulls to a sudden stop outside the building

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY begins rapid-fire dialing four digit extensions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (all but screaming) She's on her way -- tell everyone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then a dapper man of about 40 walks briskly by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought she was coming in at 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her driver text-messaged. Her facialist ruptured a disk. God, these people!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NIGEL turns and sees ANDY. Looks at EMILY. Who is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't even talk about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No time to discuss. NIGEL calls down the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, everyone. Man your battle stations! (beat, bewildered) Did somebody eat an onion bagel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind him, ANDY tries not to look guilty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sedan door opens. We see only flashes of MIRANDA, wha she's wearing, not the complete picture yet... ...Manolos, Chanel jacket, Van Cleef earrings...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ASSISTANTS frantically push clothing rails out of the way EDITORS race into their office. ANDY peers in. One of the EDITORS changes from kitten hee to sky-high stilettos... ...another pulls on a body shaper under her dress... ...another hurriedly dumps the remains of her breakfast - some cubes of cantaloupe -- into the trash...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada      2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/0

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch MIRANDA walking through the lobby. We see PEOPLE react to her-- GUARDS, ASSISTANTS and SECRETARIES cower, DISTINGUISHED EXECUTIVES bow their heads in respectful greeting. MIRANDA maintains a high rate of speed towards the elevat She gets in. The CLACKER inside immediately leaps out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Miranda. MIRANDA doesn't acknowledge her existence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY races to the kitchen (right near their bullpen). Ge glass, reaches into the fridge, pours a Pellegrino. Races into MIRANDA'S office. Races back out. Grabs an armful of magazines and newspaper from her desk and runs back into MIRANDA'S office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...MIRANDA steps out of the elevator and for the first ti we see her head-on. MIRANDA'S look is so distinctive you can spot her a mile away. She is unlike any other beautiful woman, singularly MIRANDA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY types frantically into her computer, presses print, stands by the printer waiting, takes the paper out of the printer, puts it on a clipboard. Notices ANDY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no. You're still here. Go. ANDY gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, stay. I don't want you walking past her. Just sit there and I'll pray she doesn't notice you marring the area. ANDY sits back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to herself) Wow, this is like self-esteem camp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rest of the office continues its hubbub...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..until the moment MIRANDA enters the office from recepti Instantly, a quiet falls. Everyone looks calm and professional. Or fakes it. EMILY, phony smile on her face, trots down the hall to wa MIRANDA to her office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand why it's so difficult to confirm an appointment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry, Miranda. I did confirm last night, but--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The details of your incompetence do not interest me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA gestures impatiently. EMILY hands her the clipboa MIRANDA peruses it as they walk down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell Simone I'm not approving the girl she sent in for the Brazil layout. I wanted clean, athletic, and smiling not dirty, tired and paunchy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY follows her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RSVP yes to the Michael Kors party -- the car will drop me at 9:30 and wait until I leave at 9:45... Tell Natalie at Glorious Foods for the fortieth time -- no, I don't want the tortes filled with warm rhubarb compote. I want the chopped almonds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY jots everything down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada      2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/0

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call my ex-husband and remind him the Parent-Teacher conferences at Dalton are tonight. Then call my husband and tell him to meet me for dinner at that place I went with Massimo...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And tell Richard I saw the pictures of for the feature on female paramedics and they're all so unattractive. I don't understand. How hard is it to find a decent-looking paramedic?... Also, I need to see what Nigel has called in for Gwyneth's second cover try...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA stops at EMILY'S desk, takes off her coat, dumps on EMILY'S desk, walks past ANDY, seeming not to notice h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn. Did notice her. EMILY follows MIRANDA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody. Human resources sent her up about the assistant job and I was pre- interviewing her for you, but--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll do it. The last two you sent me were total disappointments. Send her in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY walks out of MIRANDA'S office. Points at ANDY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She wants to see you.. Go go go....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And before ANDY walks in, EMILY takes ANDY'S hideous briefcase and chucks it under a desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY walks in. MIRANDA'S office is chic, clean, walls lin with photos by Avedon, Penn, Testino and Meisel. We see large framed photo of MIRANDA, her husband STEPHEN her twin GIRLS, CASSIDY and CAROLINE, in the Hamptons. The iced Pellegrino sits on a coaster on the desk. A pile magazines is fanned out precisely on a table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you? ANDY hands her resume to MIRANDA. MIRANDA ignores it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My name is Andy Sachs. I recently graduated from--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I could do a good job as your assistant and-- MIRANDA gives her a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (fast, blurting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I came to New York to be a journalist and I sent letters to everyone and I finally got a call from Elias-Clarke and met with Sherry in Human Resources and basically it's this or Auto Universe. ANDY stops, can't quite believe she said that. MIRANDA ta in this burst of honesty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you don't read Runway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And before today, you had never heard of me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada      2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/0

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you have no style or sense of fashion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That depends on--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That wasn't a question.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was Editor in Chief of the Daily Northwestern. I won a national competition for college journalists with a series on the janitor's union --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA holds up her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY, startled by the abruptness, keeps talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --that uncovered the exploitation of--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA stares. ANDY abruptly stops talking. Heads for th door. Then she stops and turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, you're right. I don't fit in here. I'm not glamorous or skinny and I don't know much about fashion. But I'm smart, I learn fast and I will work very hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And... MIRANDA says nothing. Just then we hear a voice, someone heading into MIRANDA'S office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got the exclusive on the yellow Cavalli for Gwyneth, the one he showed with a huge feathered headpiece, but she'll look like she's working the mainstage at the Golden Nugget, so instead...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NIGEL stops when he sees ANDY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada       2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to MIRANDA)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you for your time. She summons all her dignity and exits, walking past NIGEL who looks at MIRANDA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who IS that sad little person? Are we doing a Before and After piece I don't know about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY staggers out of the elevator, catching her breath. Suddenly she hears someone calling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andrea! ANDY turns. And sees EMILY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing fancy. The kind of place that refills your Sprite ANDY is with two of her friends, DOUG and LILY. DOUG is b like a linebacker and very sweet. And her boyfriend, NATE great looking, no vanity. He's the kind of guy who had hi own radio show in college and played intramural rugby. It's the end of NATE'S shift and he's wearing his kitchen whites. There are just a few people left in the restauran and at the bar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow. You got a job at a fashion magazine. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was it a phone interview? ANDY laughs, smacks him playfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be a jerk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda Priestly is famous for being unpredictable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, how is it that you know who she is and I didn't?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm actually a girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That would explain so much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seriously, Miranda is a huge deal. I bet a million girls would kill for that job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, it's just that I'm not one of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to start somewhere. Look at this dump Nate works in. Paper napkins? Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (doesn't miss a beat) And Lily works at that gallery doing-- (to LILY) What the hell is it that you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucky for me, I have my dream job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (huh?) You're a corporate research analyst.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- which totally rocks. The free bagels on Thursday? The booze? The whores?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right. There are no bagels. And only a few whores.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pavement is shiny from a recent rain. It's a chilly n in March. ANDY and NATE walk home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada      2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/0

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You should see the way the girls dress at Runway. I'm not sure I have anything to wear to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to be answering phones and getting coffee. You need a ballgown for that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I might.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you look great. Always.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles. He pulls her in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are so full of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He laughs, and kisses her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. Let's go home. I can think of something you can do without clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then a Lincoln Town Car comes barrelling up the stre going way too fast, almost clipping them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Asshole!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He and ANDY give the car the finger, laughing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Small, with a view of an air shaft. The bed's a futon. On floor. ANDY and NATE are asleep. Dim light trickles in. NATE wakes up, pulls ANDY closer. they're kissing. Their kisses become more urgent... ANDY'S cell phone rings, shrill, annoyingly upbeat. She f around, finding the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello? Now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks over at the alarm clock which reads: 6:15 AM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada       2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY is in the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda decided to kill the Autumn Jacket story for September -- she's pulling up the Sedona shoot from October. You need to go into the office right this second. Pick up her coffee order on the way. Write this down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY has tried on every bit of clothing she owns; there's huge discard pile on the floor. Her closet is empty. She looks at her outfit in the mirror. And is promptly overcome by a wave of self-hatred. No time to fix it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY, carrying a Starbucks tray loaded with coffee drinks snacks, races up the street, sloshing coffee on her shoes Her phone rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm almost there. She runs faster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY steps out of one elevator as NIGEL exits the other. beat. He realizes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. She gave me the job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clearly my opinion means nothing. (extends his hand) Nigel Kipling. Fashion Director. Let's see what we're working with. (examining her outfit) Wow. It's like Oklahoma and New Jersey had a baby out of wedlock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, I'm from Cincinnati.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's not possible. Not you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As ANDY heads off down the hall...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to the dollhouse, Baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA is standing by the door to her office as LUCIA, a beautiful Brazilian woman who is one of the Senior Editor walks in with a couple of FASHION ASSISTANTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there a reason my coffee is not here? Was I unclear in some way?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY looks panicked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY races down the hall, carrying the coffee to the bull Before ANDY can even say hello--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you know this is a very difficult job for which you are totally wrong and if you mess up MY head is on the chopping block.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY takes the coffee, brings it into MIRANDA'S office, walks back out to her desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, first of all, you and I answer the phones. The phone MUST be answered every single time it rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phones roll to voicemail, she gets very upset. If I'm not here, you are chained to this desk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if the building's on fire or my appendix explodes or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One time an assistant left the desk because she sliced her hand open with a letter opener. Miranda missed Lagerfeld right before he boarded a 17 hour flight to Australia. She now works at TV Guide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man the desk at all times. Got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone RINGS. EMILY picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda Priestly's office. She's not available. I'll tell her you called. Yet again. (back to ANDY) Remember, you and I have totally different jobs. You run errands, you get coffee, etcetera. I am in charge of her schedule, her expenses, her appointments. And, most importantly... (big drumroll, she beams) I get to go with her to Paris for Fashion Week in the fall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY points to her Arc de Triomphe screensaver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (giddy) I get to wear couture, go to all the shows, all the parties, meet all the designers. It's divine. (sighs happily, then, abruptly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada     2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, stay here. I'm going to the art department to give them the Book. EMILY shows ANDY a thick scrapbook.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Book is a mock-up of everything in the current issue. We deliver it to Miranda's apartment every night and she returns it in the morning with her notes. The second assistant is supposed to do it, but Miranda is very private and doesn't like strangers going to her house. So until she decides you're not a psycho, I get the lovely task of waiting around for the Book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do I prove I'm not a psycho?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no idea. And with that, EMILY pivots and walks away. ANDY looks around, unsure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait. What do I do if-- EMILY keeps walking. And sure enough, the phone rings. AN looks at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no. (takes a breath, picks up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mrs. Priestly's office. (beat, wincing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I meant. Miranda Priestly's office. She searches around for a pen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's in a meeting. Can I take message? I'm sorry. Can you spell Gabbana-- (they hang up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess not. She hangs up. Takes a breath. Okay. Got through one call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Just then JOCELYN, the attractively tomboyish accessories editor, walks out of MIRANDA'S office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Run-through at 3, shoot 8 am tomorrow. Of course. No problem. JOCELYN glares at ANDY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the hell does she think I am, Houdini?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, I'm Andy, I'm the new--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great. Fantastic. If you'll excuse me, I gotta go pull a bunch of fringe purses out of my ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada       2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ANDY turns and sees NIGEL walking down the hall carrying pair of stunning Dolce slingbacks. He holds out the shoes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guessed 8 1/2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's very nice of you, but I don't need those. Miranda hired me. She knows what I look like.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you?

And what they made is cooler than art, because you live your life in it -- I mean, not you, but some people. This is not just a magazine. It's a shining beacon of hope for, oh, I don't know, say a young boy growing up in Rhode Island with six brothers, pretending to go to soccer practice when he was actually at sewing class and reading Runway at night under the covers with a flashlight. dialogues.text: MIRANDA walks in. JAMES is standing there with his staff his Public Relations team. JAMES is clearly buzzing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda. Great to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada       2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: MIRANDA diligently kisses both of his cheeks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got the sketches for your dress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. I did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat. And she conspicuously does not say she liked them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And her tone is very remote. And now we can see JAMES rea start to quake. MIRANDA arranges herself on the Mies daybed, legs folded, ramrod straight. The other RUNWAY editors -- NIGEL, JOCEL and LUCIA and their assistants, stand behind MIRANDA. JAMES and his people stand off to the side as a few fit MODELS begin walking out in various outfits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This season I started to think about the intersection of East and West...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one in the room watches anything except -- MIRANDA'S reaction. As JAMES speaks, we dissolve from outfit to outfit. JAMES trying desperately to impress MIRANDA. He's practically t dancing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't want to do, say, a blonde in a kimono. It's more about capturing the Eastern sensibility in the Western woman. Kind of Uma Thurman in Kill Bill in a kick ass dress with an obi belt. The modern woman as Geisha meets rock star, with a little Desperate Housewives thrown in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, there's a glimpse of movement from Miranda -- c it be a nod? Everyone holds their breath. No, she's just straightening her glasses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And this, of course, is the dress we're making for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: An overly busy red dress with too many fashion ideas bein attempted at one time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lush Asian fabric, tailored, but with a bit of movement to work against the modernism. And suddenly, there it is, the kiss of death. The dreaded pursing of the lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Runway team files out, MIRANDA first. ANDY and NIGEL together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto voce)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pursed her lips and because of that he's going to change his entire collection?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You still don't get it, do you? Her opinion is the only one that matters. MIRANDA, about to get into the town car, turns to ANDY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make sure you confirm my dinner with--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Galliano at Pastis. Done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I need to see the look book for the November denim shoot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's in the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. MIRANDA turns to leave, pauses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, and you'll be bringing The Book to my home tonight. Emily will give you the key, Andrea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A key, as EMILY hands it to ANDY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guard this with your life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course. If I can deliver the Book, that means I must have done something right, that she doesn't think I'm psycho. Oh, and she actually called me Andrea instead of Emily. Isn't that great?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (deadpan)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Whoopee. Okay, now, it's very important that you do EXACTLY what I'm about to tell you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear EMILY'S voiceover as we see this happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Book is assembled by 10 or 10:30, so you must wait around until then. We see ANDY, waiting. The area around MIRANDA'S office is totally quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY drifts in and looks at MIRANDA'S office -- the pictu of her with everyone from Desmond Tutu to Paris Hilton. Then ANDY walks over to MIRANDA'S pristine white couch. S on it. Hell, why not. Lies down on it. Gingerly. Then--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (loud)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Book's ready! And ANDY startles and falls completely off the couch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An editorial ASSISTANT brings ANDY The Book. It's heavy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be delivering Miranda's dry cleaning with the book. We see ANDY removing the dry cleaning from the closet -- about a dozen garments on hangers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY whisks across town. It's late, the streets are quiet

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The driver will take you to Miranda's townhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY unloads the car and walks up the flight of stairs in front of the townhouse, carrying the book and dry cleanin She takes out a key.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let yourself in. ANDY takes a deep breath and turns the lock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY steps into a marble-floored foyer with a large stair looming right in front of her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On EMILY, intense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do not talk to anyone. Do not look at anyone. That is of the utmost importance. You must be invisible. Do you understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY steps inside, her footsteps echoing through the foye

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open the door, walk across the foyer, then hang the dry cleaning in the closet across from the staircase. ANDY looks. There are two identical doors on each side of staircase. Dammit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada         2nd Blue In Progress   12/0

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And leave the Book on the table with the flowers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY looks. There are one, two, three tables... all in different areas of the house. She looks very confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly she hears a noise. She looks up and sees two gir of about 12, CASSIDY and CAROLINE, peering down the staircase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's that door. On the left.

dialogues.text: ANDY hangs the dry cleaning. The girls call down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can give us the Book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll give it to her.

dialogues.text: ANDY shakes her head. No no no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay. Come on up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I can't... Shh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And ANDY, unsure what to do, starts to walk up the stairs She gets about halfway up when she hears voices... MIRANDA and her husband, STEPHEN are in the dining room, sliver of which is visible from the foyer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you want me to do? Walk out in the middle of a photo shoot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY freezes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I rushed out of an investment committee meeting early, then I sat there waiting for you for almost an hour...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were in a loft near the Seaport. My phone didn't work. I told you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and I knew what everyone in the restaurant was thinking. There he is, waiting for HER again-- And as he says this he stops, curious. There on the stair head peeking into the second floor, is ANDY, frozen. With the TWINS smiling at her. And before ANDY can stop herself, her eyes float over to STEPHEN'S. Eye contact. Her heart does a flip. And her ey dart over to MIRANDA and they make eye contact as well... ... and MIRANDA gives ANDY a look of utter coldness, disg and judgement. ANDY freezes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY closes the door to the townhouse, heart pounding. 97   INT. ANDY & NATE'S APARTMENT -- NIGHT ANDY crawls into bed next to NATE, heart racing, and look at the ceiling, freaking out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY walks in, already bracing herself, and runs into EMI emerging from MIRANDA'S office, very upset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, before you start freaking out, it wasn't such a big deal. The twins said hello, I said hello back, then I went upstairs and gave the book to Miranda--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You went upstairs? Oh my God. Why didn't you just climb into bed with her and ask for a bedtime story?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada      2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/0

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right. I made a mistake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you understand? If you get fired, that might jeopardize Paris for me. And if that happens, I will search every Blimpie's in the tri-state area until I find you and kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a second. She's going to fire me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. She's not happy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And they hear MIRANDA'S voice, ringing out from the offic

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An-dre-a.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY and EMILY exchange a look. Oh, boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY walks in, apprehensive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda, about last night, I--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need the new Harry Potter book for the twins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course. I'll run down to Barnes & Noble right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you fall down and smack your little head on the pavement?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not that I can recall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have all the published Harry Potter books. The girls want to know what happens next.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY stands there a moment, fully aware of the impossibil of what MIRANDA just asks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada         2nd Blue In Progress   12/0

dialogues.text: So you want the... unpublished manuscript.

dialogues.text: MIRANDA gives her a look. Is there a problem?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We know everyone in publishing. Shouldn't be a problem. (beat) You can do anything, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY paces, panicky. EMILY watches her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She doesn't get it. There's no way I can get that book. I don't care who I call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then MIRANDA walks out. ANDY springs up to get her c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My girls are leaving on the train to their Grandmother's at 3. They'll need the book by then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd like my steak in fifteen minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great. I have to get the impossible manuscript in four hours. And Smith and Wollensky's doesn't open until 11:30. How am I supposed to get the steak? (paces) She's going to fire me, isn't she? She's just prolonging the kill. Like an evil cat with a tiny unfashionable mouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada      2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/0

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh look, you're getting paranoid. Yay. It's not just me. Listen, don't freak out. There could be a silver lining here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY looks at her. Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When Miranda gives someone an impossible task, it generally means one of two things. One, she thinks you can actually pull it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or, you know, that thing you were saying about the cat.

dialogues.text: We see ANDY racing down the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY flies into frame on the phone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's for Miranda Priestly... it's very important. Yes, I know, it's impossible to get...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything? Can you try again? I would really appreciate any leads at all... thanks. No pressure. If I don't have it by 3, I'm fired.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What an amazing job, working for someone like Ms. Priestly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.text: Yeah. It's a real party.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 104pt   EXT. STREET -- DAY ANDY on the cell phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen. I desperately need a favor. And I don't know many people in the book world...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On CHRISTIAN, getting out of a taxi.

dialogues.text: The Harry Potter manuscript? You've gotta be kidding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On ANDY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're talking about Miranda Priestly. There is no plan B, only plan A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is she back? Am I fired?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, I rarely say this to people who aren't me, but you need to calm down. ANDY ignores her, racing around getting the dishes and silverware for MIRANDA'S steak.

dialogues.text: ANDY is getting MIRANDA'S coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on the cell phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry Potter. (jump cut)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The manuscript. (jump cut)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's for Miranda Priestly. (jump cut to)

dialogues.text: Can you make it extra hot? Like, center of the sun hot? The BARRISTA gives her a look.

dialogues.text: Sorry, my boss is particular. (into phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you sure? You're my last shot. (sighs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, well, thanks for trying. She hangs up. The BARRISTA hands her the coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds like a great job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, it is. A million girls would kill for it. And she starts to laugh. The girl stares at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY walks out of the Starbucks with the order on a tray. ANDY stands there a moment. People bustle around her, as finds herself at a literal crossroads. She looks up at the building. Suddenly she stops a PASSER who looks at her, curious. Yeah, lady?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Want a mocha? And ANDY starts passing Starbucks to people on the street

dialogues.text: NATE on the phone. Intercut with him and ANDY on the stre

dialogues.text: Quit? Are you sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I failed. She's going to fire me anyway. Might as well beat her to the punch.

dialogues.text: Wow. Good for you. Congratulations, Andy. You're free.

dialogues.text: Call you later.

dialogues.text: ANDY hangs up, and immediately her phone rings again. She looks down. Assuming it's NATE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm brilliant. Really. Monuments should be erected in my honor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 110pt   EXT. STREET -- DAY Between ANDY and CHRISTIAN, also walking down the street.

dialogues.text: You didn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yes. A friend of a friend does the cover art. She has the manuscript.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. That would mean I actually... did something right. (stunned) But see... thing is... See, I was about to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: You want this, you better hurry. Meet me at the St. Regis.

dialogues.text: Yes, I'm meeting someone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right this way.

dialogues.text: CHRISTIAN is having drinks. ANDY runs in. He hands her a manuscript.

dialogues.text: You have one hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY is xeroxing the manuscript and talking on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm begging you. You have to stall her. Just ten minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see HENRY, driving MIRANDA. He hangs up the cell phone Then he turns down a side street. MIRANDA catches his eye in the mirror. What the hell?

dialogues.text: Too much traffic on 5th. UN's in session.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA makes an annoyed face.

dialogues.text: The tray with Miranda's Starbucks on it... We follow it d the hall and see it being set on MIRANDA'S desk. And beside it lands boom! an envelope. Widen out to see-- 115A   INT. RUNWAY - MIRANDA'S OFFICE -- DAY. MIRANDA, looking at the envelope. And then we see ANDY. She stands there, quiet, calm. And if MIRANDA is amazed by what ANDY did, she doesn't sh it. She opens the envelope, looks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One copy? What are my twins supposed to do with that... share?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually I made two copies. And had them color-copied, re-set and bound so they wouldn't look like manuscripts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles. MIRANDA nods, but still won't concede the poi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And where exactly are those fabulous copies? I don't see them anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MetroNorth from New York City to Bedford. In the front row, we see two girls in matching outfits wi two matching Harry Potter manuscripts. The twins, with th NANNY beside them.

dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.text: ANDY smiles at MIRANDA. Her faith in herself restored.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (brightly)

dialogues.text: Anything else I can do for you?

dialogues.text: ANDY walks out. The CLACKERS stream in and out of the building. And ANDY raises her arms and does a victory dan now graceful in her stilettos. People stare. Doesn't bother her. 119   INT. ANDY & NATE'S APARTMENT -- NIGHT ANDY is making a small diorama of the planetary system. N walks in. He's carrying a bag of groceries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I went over to Dean & DeLuca -- man, they charge like five bucks a strawberry, but I figured, you quit, we should celebrate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Nate-- And he sees what she's doing. Realizes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you quit, but you're still doing the twins' science project. Big of you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After I called you, I realized... It doesn't make sense to throw away all these months of hard work. I just had a moment of weakness. That's all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Either that or your job sucks and your boss is a wacko. She looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Whatever. It's your job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no. It's an important magazine. That's what you said, right?

dialogues.text: He sees the latest issue of Runway. Picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see... How to buy a custom-made 600 dollar bra. That's important. A list of the 10 best wrinkle creams under $500. That's important.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I get the point, Nate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The new Botox. The new pea coat. The new (wrestling with the word) Gstaad. What the hell is--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See? I now live with someone who knows that. Thank you, Miranda Priestly.

dialogues.text: Nate, it's not like I run the magazine. I just work there, remember?

dialogues.text: NATE doesn't say anything, keeps putting away groceries. walks over to him.

dialogues.text: But he doesn't look too convinced.

dialogues.text: He doesn't take the bait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And this skirt? (nothing) Okay. What about this?

dialogues.text: I like that.

dialogues.text: Tonight is not just an important night for me, for Runway, and for James, it's also important for someone else in this room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY shoots a look at CHRISTIAN. Can tell from the look o his face he has no idea where this is going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As of next month, James will be partnering with CFG in an expansion of his line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Light applause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: James and Runway have one important thing in common -- a commitment to excellence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY looks over at NIGEL. Beaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And so it comes as no surprise that James has selected someone from the Runway family as the new copresident of JH International...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NIGEL straightens his suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My esteemed colleague, Jacqueline Follet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And she indicates JACQUELINE, who waves. Everyone applaud ANDY'S mouth falls open. She looks over at NIGEL again. H face betrays nothing. He applauds along with everyone els And ANDY looks to CHRISTIAN. Who is also shocked as hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's wish Jacqueline the best as she pursues this wonderful opportunity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hearty round of applause for JACQUELINE. MIRANDA smiles

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now to the business at hand. A celebration of one of my favorite designers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles at JAMES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY watches everyone swirling around MIRANDA. She walks to NIGEL among the crowd of well-wishers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said it was your dream job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to her. Some emotion on his face now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've given her everything I have, Andy. She knows that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you don't need her. You could just leave anyway and-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quickly cutting her off) When the time is right, she'll pay me back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure about that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. But I hope for the best. I have to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he rejoins the swirl. Just then CHRISTIAN catches ANDY'S eye. At the same time, MIRANDA appears in front of her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm ready to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And ANDY turns and walks away, without so much as a glanc back at CHRISTIAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA and ANDY ride in the limo on their way back to Pa MIRANDA is as relaxed as we've seen her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You thought I didn't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've known what was happening for quite some time. It took a little while to find a suitable alternative for Jacqueline, one she would accept. Turned out, that James Holt job is so absurdly overpaid--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 189aaA INT. RESTAURANT -- DAY MIRANDA introduces MASSIMO to JACQUELINE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --she jumped at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 189baA INT. LIMO -- DAY ANDY takes this in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I let Irv know Jacqueline was unavailable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 189aA   INT. MIRANDA'S HOTEL ROOM -- DAY MIRANDA welcomes IRV into her hotel suite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05 189aA   CONTINUED:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Truth is, there's no one who can do what I do, her included.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 189aB   INT. LIMO -- DAY ANDY watches MIRANDA, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any of his other choices would find the job impossible and the magazine would surely suffer. Especially because of the list--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 189aC   INT. MIRANDA'S HOTEL ROOM -- DAY A quick flash of MIRANDA with IRV. She pushes a list acro the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05 189aC   CONTINUED:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --designers, photographers, editors, writers, models, all of whom were found and nurtured by me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 189aD   INT. LIMO -- DAY ANDY listens, amazed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...all of whom have promised to follow me whenever and if ever I leave Runway. To any publication I choose. Of course, as soon as Irv understood, he reconsidered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 189aE   OMITTED 189aF   INT. LIMO -- DAY ANDY looks at MIRANDA, taking it all in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05 189aF   CONTINUED:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I must say, I was impressed with you, how intently you tried to warn me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY looks at her, stunned that she knows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never thought I would say this, Andrea, but I see some of myself in you. Your dedication, your focus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA looks out the window. They're approaching the nex party and the paparazzi are waiting outside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People think success happens to you. It doesn't. You choose it. Every day, I choose excellence. Who else does what I do, at my level? Nobody. They don't even understand what it takes, the days, measured in milliseconds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY stares at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But now you know --and I know -- that you have it in you. That you can see beyond what other people want and choose for yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles, like she's just given ANDY an enormous compliment. ANDY reels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I don't think I am like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA looks at her. Oh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I couldn't do what you did to Nigel, Miranda. There's no way I could do something like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pause. ANDY can barely believe what she said. But instead exploding... MIRANDA smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you can. You already did. To Emily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY reels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05 189aF   CONTINUED: (2)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not what I -- that was different. I didn't have a choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You did choose. You chose to get ahead. You want this life, those choices are necessary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what if it's not what I want? I mean, what if I don't want to live the way you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA looks at her and smiles, and this time, for the f time, her smile is almost maternal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be silly, Andrea. This is what everyone wants. Everyone wants to be us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And with that she opens the door to the limo...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...onto the red carpet where she is instantly embraced by flashing lights of the cameras. ANDY quietly steps out behind MIRANDA. Squinting. She's n gotten used to the lights. MIRANDA moves down the red carpet. We follow her. It's no until MIRANDA is about to open the door that she realizes ANDY is no longer beside her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see ANDY, walking up the street in the dusky light. She has never looked more beautiful. She is serene. And s is free. The wind blows through her hair. She smiles. Her phone rings. She looks down. Sees the name MIRANDA. ANDY doesn't break stride for a moment as she... ...tosses the ringing phone into the nearest fountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY walks off the plane. Sees LILY standing there, among CHAUFFEURS, holding a sign that says SACHS. ANDY cracks u walks over to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry. Town car's in the shop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada          2nd Blue In Progress   12/

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're such a pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you'd be lost without me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: True.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hug. And start walking away together...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does this mean I have to give my purse back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hugs it close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY waits nervously. NATE walks in, slides into the boot across from her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to be at work in ten minutes. What's up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just wanted to say...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gathers her nerve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nate, you were right. About everything. I turned my back on my friends, my family, on everything I believed in. And for what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoes. And jackets and belts and--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nate, I'm just... I'm so sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat. He looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I flew up to Boston while you were gone. Interviewed at the Oak Room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada          2nd Blue In Progress   12/

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're looking at their new sous-chef. I'm moving up there in a few weeks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's great, I... congratulations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A moment. As it sinks in what this means.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't know what I'm going to do without those late night grilled cheeses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They have bread in Boston. Might even have Jarlsberg. We might be able to figure something out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You never know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They smile at each other. Friends, at least, for now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, how about you? What are you going to do now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not worried about you. Anything you try, you're gonna kick ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think so?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I know it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks. I actually have a job interview today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat. He looks her up and down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that's what you're wearing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY sits across from a scruffy guy in his early forties.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know our pay is crap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada       2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your clips were excellent. That thing on the janitor's union... that's exactly what we do here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles, humble now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My only question is... Runway? What the hell kind of blip was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Learned a lot. In the end, though, I kind of screwed it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not what I hear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY looks at him, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I called over there for a reference, left word with some snooty girl, next thing you know I got a fax from Miranda Priestly herself--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY blanches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...saying that of all the assistants she had, you were by far her biggest disappointment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY takes a deep breath...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that if I don't hire you I'm an idiot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On ANDY, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must have done something right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY walks over to the Elias-Clarke building, looking at place that was, in its way, a home to her. Her eyes sweep up the building to the Runway offices. She takes out her cell phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see EMILY, back at her desk. The camera widens out so can see... a new SECOND ASSISTANT, eager and nervous. She showing EMILY a letter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My God, you call this a letter? Can you spell any word in the English language?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone rings. EMILY picks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda Priestly's office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emily, it's Andy. Don't hang up. I have a favor to ask you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMILY looks incredulous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're joking. YOU have a favor to ask of ME?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY is walking up the street, on her cell phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thing is, I have all these clothes from Paris and I don't have anyplace to wear them, so I was wondering... is there any way you could take them off my hands?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat. EMILY realizes what ANDY is offering, but she won't that show...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada    2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I don't know. It is a huge imposition, but I suppose I could help you out... I'll have Roy pick them up this afternoon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, Emily. I appreciate it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And without a goodbye, EMILY hangs up. The slightest smil creeps across EMILY'S face, but she quickly recovers, han the ASSISTANT the letter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why can't you be more like Andy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY hangs up her phone and smiles. And suddenly she sees MIRANDA walk out of the building, on the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I don't understand why it's so challenging to get a car when I ask for one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It should be there any second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And at that moment the car edges into view. MIRANDA hangs and strides towards it. And just then something catches MIRANDA'S eyes. ANDY, watching her. They look at each other. A beat. And then ANDY nods her head -- in thanks, in salutation, in farewell... But MIRANDA does not react. She gets into the car. ANDY shakes her head. That's MIRANDA. She smiles, then tu and starts to walk down the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRANDA gets in, sits back in her seat. Through her windo she can see ANDY, a bounce in her step, walking away... And MIRANDA, alone, where no one can see her, finally bre into a real smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Devil Wears Prada   2nd Blue In Progress   12/00/05

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: She nods to her driver. Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANDY walks away, smiles, shakes her head, the whole thing almost like a dream. And as she continues moving confiden in the opposite direction from MIRANDA we...
